    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        public D analyze(FlowPoint cfg)
        Parameters:
        cfg - The FlowPoint that represents the start of the control flow graph.
        Returns:
        the result of the AnalysisDomain after Analysis.onFinish(). This can also be thought of as the result of the domain at time of program exits.

      • updateAnalysis

        private D updateAnalysis(D inputDomain,
                         FlowPoint target)
        updateAnalysis is called each iteration of the fixed point algorithm. It represents a visit to a single flow point in the control flow graph.
        Parameters:
        inputDomain - The domain that should be modified.
        target - The target the flow point that will be visited.
        Returns:
        the modified input domain. Depending on the implementation of Analysis, a pointer to the same object may be returned; this is what the framework does by default.

      • mergeParents

        private D mergeParents(FlowPoint target)
        Merges all parent domains together of the target.
        Parameters:
        target - The domain that all previous flow points' domains should be merged.
        Returns:
        the merged target domain
